episode_event_academy_autumn/4001_1001_0:
I’m glad it was just a minor injury. Does it
hurt anywhere else?

Thanks to you, I can go all out and get
movin’ again!
Now now, don’t do anything rash!

...is what I want to say, but you look the
type to immediately do just that.

Well, I’ll fix you up again as long as you
don’t hurt yourself TOO bad. If you need
my help, just let me know!

Thanks a million, Teach! I’m eternally in
your debt!
OK, now you’re just being silly.
episode_event_academy_autumn/4001_1001_1:
I do like how you called me
“Teach,” though!

How’d you hurt yourself this time anyway?
It doesn’t look like you tripped or anything.

A Pokémon got lost and wandered into
the middle of a battle.
Hugh shielded it with his body and got hurt.

Can I speak with you a moment,
Ms. Miriam?
episode_event_academy_autumn/6801_1001_0:
At Pasio Academy, you can learn as a
student no matter your age or experience.

We can see firsthand how others teach—and
have other teachers observe us. It’s a great
way to learn!

And I gotta say, sitting at a desk next to
everyone else really brings me back!

I bet they’ve got even more great ideas at
Pasio Academy to motivate us!
episode_event_academy_autumn/4002_1001_0:
You’re Jasmine, right? If I’m not mistaken,
you’re in my class!

Y-yes, that’s right. I, um... I wanted to ask
a favor of you, Ms. Miriam, since you’re a
health teacher in Paldea.

Could you please teach me how to treat
people and Pokémon?
Why? Hoping to become a doctor?
One time, I had to care for a sick Pokémon...

If I find a Pokémon or person like that again,
I want to be able to help them.

So that’s why you want to learn!
What a great idea.
episode_event_academy_autumn/4002_1001_1: Oh, um... I-I don’t know about that...
You want to help people and Pokémon.

Of course I’ll teach you! How could I refuse
such a sweet, kind student?

When you want to learn something, having a
goal or dream can keep you motivated.
I’m sure you’ll learn a lot from Ms. Miriam!

Hey, speaking of treating people! You should
take a look at Mr. Kabu here!
What?! Did Mr. Kabu hurt himself too?
episode_event_academy_autumn/4002_1001_2: Huh... Looks like I did get a scrape.

Maybe it happened when I was hurrying
to get Ms. Miriam to help Hugh.

Oh goodness! Now that I’ve a better look...
You’ve also got little burns on your fingers,
don’t you!
Yeah, things got a bit heated in my class.

But when you’re a Fire-type Pokémon user,
burns come with the territory, right?

*sigh* Every school seems to have teachers
who are always getting hurt.

Well, this is sooner than I expected, but shall
we start studying how to treat injuries—with
Mr. Kabu as our subject?
episode_event_academy_autumn/4003_1001_0: OK, that’s all I have for class today.

Got it? When it comes to learning, it’s never
too late—and it’s never over!
Anyone can keep their fire burning!

Believe in your own potential, everyone,
and keep pushing on!
Wow! That was a class I’ll never forget!

I didn’t just learn facts and stuff. I also
learned how important it is to have the
right mindset!

I, um... I was actually a little worried about
whether I could learn things here at
Pasio Academy...

But after listening to Mr. Kabu’s class,
I’m optimistic!
episode_event_academy_autumn/4003_1001_1:
It takes me back to when I was working
hard to become a health teacher.

I’m so glad I attended this class as a
student today!

Wow, hearing this from you all makes it all
worth it!

I wish I could teach classes that touch
students’ hearts, like you do.

You’ve got nothing to worry about,
Ms. Miriam!

Need proof? Think of how you looked after
me when I was injured!

You gave me just the treatment I needed,
Ms. Miriam, and on top of that...

Jasmine kept checking on me and Hugh to
see how we were doing.

I did my best to apply everything you taught
me, Ms. Miriam!
episode_event_academy_autumn/4003_1001_2:
So I guess that means although Jasmine
definitely put in the effort...
you also did a great job teaching her!

I guess I could be a proper teacher to at
least one student!

Yeah! And I learned that from now on,
I’ll be OK no matter how injured I get!

Hey! That is NOT the takeaway here! You’re
supposed to avoid getting injured in the
first place!
episode_event_academy_autumn/4004_1001_0: Wow, is it that time already?
It’s rare to see the two of you together.

No, nothing like that. Mr. Maxie is going to
teach the next class here, and we got to
talking.

I only planned on making small talk, but we
ended up having a lively conversation!

We made each other’s acquaintance only
recently, but we both have a connection to
Hoenn—and have a lot in common!

And I’ve also started using Camerupt more
during class here at Pasio Academy.
episode_event_academy_autumn/4004_1001_1:
Mr. Maxie here has a partner Camerupt too,
so I’ve been getting good reference
material from his classes.

I too have gained a lot of insight from
your classes.

We should continue with each other’s classes
and learn from one another.

All right, time to get going! Off to my
next class!
He sure is. We’d better do our best too!

“Keep learning and training as long as
you’re alive...”
Yeah! I’m getting fired up too!
